title: Elbow Grease Glass Cleaner with Vinegar for Windows and Mirrors, 500 ml - Window Cleaning Equipment (Pack of 1)
features: Glass Cleaner with Vinegar (Elbow Grease) - 500ml Removes grease, grime, and fingerprints from everyday surfaces quickly and easily. Windows, mirrors, and other glass surfaces can all benefit from this product. With vinegar sparkling cleaning power Allows for a streak-free finish
Properly Sanitize - The Elbow Grease Glass Cleaner will leave your surfaces sparkling clean after removing dirt, grime, dust, grease, and unsightly fingerprints
Powerful and Flexible Use - Elbow Grease Glass Cleaner can be used on a variety of glass surfaces, including mirrors and windows, as well as glasses and glass tables

Vinegar Added - Vinegar is the most efficient glass cleaner when it comes to natural ingredients and homemade products. Elbow Grease's unique vinegar-based formula shines and cleans your windows, mirrors, and glass surfaces
Variations - Elbow Grease glasses cleaner have different pack sizes: Pack of 1, Pack of 3, Pack of 6 and Pack of 12
description: Product Description Transform your glass surfaces with Elbow Grease Glass Cleaner! This powerful, vinegar-based spray removes stubborn grime, grease, and fingerprints, leaving a streak-free, sparkling finish every time. With Elbow Grease’s signature cleaning power, this 500ml spray bottle is an essential for deep cleaning windows, mirrors, glass tables, and shower screens. Say goodbye to smudges and hello to a crystal-clear shine that enhances your space. Whether you’re tackling everyday smudges or giving a final polish to your window cleaning routine, this cleaner has it all. Elbow Grease Glass Cleaner is designed for quick and effective results with a spray nozzle that covers a broad area, making cleaning simple and fast. It’s not only highly effective on windows but also works wonders on mirrors and even stove glass, giving it versatility that fits any cleaning kit. This cleaner is perfect for a full cleaning session or a quick touch-up to keep your home sparkling. Trust Elbow Grease for a powerful, streak-free clean that brightens your glass surfaces effortlessly. Ingredients Contains Methylchloroisothiazolinone and Methylisothiazolinone. May produce an allergic reaction. Directions * Turn the spray nozzle to the 'ON' position * Spray directly onto the surface from a distance of 20cm and wipe with a paper towel or clean cloth * Return spray nozzle to 'OFF' position * For heavily soiled surfaces repeat application Safety Warning Avoid inhalation of vapours,spray and contact with skin and eyes. Manufacturer Contact Information Elbow Grease Glass Cleaner **NEW** 500ml See more
